thread.title: Onondaga County hires promoter, manager for new amphitheater
thread.title_full: Onondaga County hires promoter, manager for new amphitheater | syracuse.com

author: Michelle Breidenbach | mbreidenbach@syracuse.com
title: Onondaga County hires promoter, manager for new amphitheater
text:
SYRACUSE, N.Y. - Onondaga County is negotiating contracts with SMG and Live Nation to manage and promote concerts at the new Lakeshore Amphitheater , Onondaga County Executive Joanie Mahoney confirmed Thursday.
The $50 million outdoor concert stage was built on the western shore of Onondaga Lake in six months. It opened in September with a Miranda Lambert concert.
Live Nation promoted that concert and SMG managed the venue.
SMG already has a contract with Onondaga County to manage the Oncenter convention center, the War Memorial and the Civic Center.
Details of the new contracts have not yet been announced.
